Package me.hsgamer.unihologram.display

Interface DisplayHologram<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the location
All Superinterfaces:
Hologram<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FHHologram
public interface DisplayHologram<T> extends Hologram<T>
The Hologram that uses the new Minecraft TextDisplay API

    • getOriginLocation

      T getOriginLocation()
      Get the origin location. This is the location of the text display, while Hologram.getLocation() is the location of the top of the display.
      Returns:
      the origin location
